entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 10:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -10.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -14.9°C
Wind: WSW 30 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing this evening. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:52 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:52 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:52 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
